headline.main: DRUG UNIT SEIZES REDUCING TABLETS; Thyroid-Digitalis Pills Called Unsafe by Federal Agency

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr.Special to The New York Times

docs.abstract: FDA seizes in Denver large number of Western Research Labs thyroid and thyroid-digitalis tablets used in weight reduction programs; US Atty's Office complaint calls drugs dangerous when used as suggested by label
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 5 -The Government seized today in Denver a large number of thyroid and thyroid-digitalis tablets that the Food and Drug Administration said had been promoted for use in weight reduction programs.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 5 -The Government seized today in Denver a large number of thyroid and thyroid-digitalis tablets that the Food and Drug Administration said had been promoted for use in weight reduction programs.
